## SendableEthersLiquity.openTrove() method

Open a new Trove by depositing collateral and borrowing YUSD.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
openTrove(params?: any, ICRWithFees?: any, maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams?: any, overrides?: any): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | any | How much to deposit and borrow. |
|  ICRWithFees | any |  |
|  maxBorrowingRateOrOptionalParams | any |  |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxBorrowingRate` is omitted, the current borrowing rate plus 0.5% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
